description.zh-cn: 由成吉思汗建立的横跨欧亚两洲的全球帝国，也是历史上邻接版图最辽阔的国家。1260年后因内战分裂为元朝和四大汗国，1368年元朝被明朝取代，标志着蒙古帝国的瓦解。
description.en: A global empire spanning Eurasia founded by Genghis Khan, and the largest contiguous land empire in history. After 1260, it fractured into the Yuan dynasty and the Four Khanates due to a civil war. The fall of the Yuan dynasty to the Ming dynasty in 1368 marks its dissolution.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古帝国的创始人和第一位大汗，统一了蒙古高原各部落，并领导了多次对外征服战争。
description.en: The founder and first Great Khan of the Mongol Empire, who united many of the nomadic tribes of Northeast Asia and initiated the Mongol invasions.

description.zh-cn: 成吉思汗的第三子，蒙古帝国的第二位大汗。在他的统治下，帝国继续扩张，并最终灭亡了金朝。
description.en: The third son of Genghis Khan and the second Great Khan of the Mongol Empire. Under his rule, the empire continued to expand and conquered the Jin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 成吉思汗的第四子。成吉思汗去世后，他曾担任监国，直到其兄窝阔台被选为大汗。他的后代包括蒙哥、忽必烈、旭烈兀和阿里不哥。
description.en: The fourth son of Genghis Khan. After Genghis Khan's death, he served as regent until his brother Ögedei was elected Great Khan. His descendants include Möngke, Kublai, Hulagu, and Ariq Böke.

description.zh-cn: 拖雷的长子，蒙古帝国的第四位大汗，也是最后一位统治统一帝国的蒙古大汗。他在征伐南宋期间于钓鱼城去世。
description.en: The eldest son of Tolui and the fourth Great Khan of the Mongol Empire, and the last to rule over a united empire. He died during the campaign against the Southern Song dynasty at Diaoyu Fortress.

description.zh-cn: 拖雷的第四子，蒙古帝国的第五位大汗，元朝的创始皇帝。他在与阿里不哥的内战中获胜，但其汗位未被所有汗国承认，导致帝国分裂。
description.en: The fourth son of Tolui, the fifth Great Khan of the Mongol Empire, and the founder of the Yuan dynasty. He won the civil war against Ariq Böke, but his claim was not universally recognized, leading to the division of the empire.

description.zh-cn: 拖雷的幼子。在蒙哥汗去世后，他与兄长忽必烈争夺汗位，引发了拖雷家族内战，最终失败投降。
description.en: The youngest son of Tolui. After Möngke Khan's death, he contended for the title of Great Khan with his brother Kublai, leading to the Toluid Civil War, in which he was ultimately defeated and surrendered.

description.zh-cn: 拖雷的儿子，伊儿汗国的建立者。他领导了蒙古第三次西征，攻陷巴格达，灭亡了阿拔斯王朝。
description.en: A son of Tolui and the founder of the Ilkhanate. He led the third Mongol invasion of West Asia, capturing Baghdad and destroying the Abbasid Caliphate.

description.zh-cn: 由女真人建立的中国古代王朝，曾是蒙古诸部的宗主国，后被蒙古帝国所灭。
description.en: A Jurchen-led dynasty in Chinese history that was once the suzerain of the Mongol tribes, later conquered by the Mongol Empire.

description.zh-cn: 中国宋朝的南迁政权，与金朝长期对峙。曾与蒙古联合灭金，后被元朝所灭。
description.en: The southern regime of the Song dynasty in China, which had a long-standing conflict with the Jin dynasty. It allied with the Mongols to conquer the Jin, but was later conquered by the Yuan dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 由党项族在中国西北部建立的王朝，是蒙古帝国早期征服的目标之一，最终被成吉思汗所灭。
description.en: A dynasty founded by the Tangut people in northwestern China, one of the early targets of the Mongol Empire's conquests, eventually destroyed by Genghis Khan.

description.zh-cn: 由契丹人建立的中亚帝国，后被蒙古帝国所灭。
description.en: A Khitan-led empire in Central Asia, later conquered by the Mongol Empire.

description.zh-cn: 一个统治中亚和伊朗大部分地区的穆斯林王朝，因讹答剌事件与蒙古帝国爆发战争，最终被成吉思汗征服。
description.en: A Muslim dynasty that ruled large parts of Central Asia and Iran. The Otrar incident triggered a war with the Mongol Empire, leading to its conquest by Genghis Khan.

description.zh-cn: 伊斯兰教的第二个哈里发王朝，首都巴格达。1258年被旭烈兀率领的蒙古军队攻陷首都而灭亡。
description.en: The second of the two great caliphates of the Islamic caliphate. Its capital, Baghdad, was sacked by the Mongol forces led by Hulagu in 1258, bringing the caliphate to an end.

description.zh-cn: 蒙哥汗去世后，其弟忽必烈与阿里不哥为争夺汗位而爆发的内战。这场战争导致了蒙古帝国的实质性分裂。
description.en: A war of succession fought between Kublai Khan and his younger brother, Ariq Böke, for the title of Great Khan after the death of Möngke Khan. The war resulted in the de facto division of the Mongol Empire.

description.zh-cn: 由忽必烈建立的统治中国及周边地区的王朝，是蒙古帝国分裂后的主要继承者之一。其统治范围包括蒙古高原和中国大部分地区。
description.en: A dynasty established by Kublai Khan that ruled over China and surrounding areas, one of the main successor states of the Mongol Empire. Its territory included the Mongolian Plateau and most of modern-day China.

description.zh-cn: 由朱元璋建立的中国汉族王朝，于1368年攻陷元大都，将元朝势力驱逐至长城以北，结束了蒙古帝国在中原的统治。
description.en: A Han Chinese dynasty founded by Zhu Yuanzhang. In 1368, it captured the Yuan capital Dadu, driving the Yuan forces north of the Great Wall and ending the Mongol Empire's rule over China proper.

description.zh-cn: 明朝的开国皇帝。他领导的红巾军起义推翻了元朝在中国的统治。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Ming dynasty. His Red Turban rebellion overthrew the Yuan dynasty's rule in China.

description.zh-cn: 元朝被明朝推翻后，其残余势力退回蒙古高原建立的政权，被视为元朝的延续。
description.en: The remnant state of the Yuan dynasty that retreated to the Mongolian Plateau after being overthrown by the Ming dynasty, considered a continuation of the Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古乞颜部首领，成吉思汗的父亲。被塔塔儿部人毒死。
description.en: A major chief of the Khamag Mongol confederation and the father of Genghis Khan. He was poisoned by Tatars.

description.zh-cn: 13世纪蒙古帝国进行的一系列大规模军事扩张，征服了亚洲和东欧的大部分地区。
description.en: A series of large-scale military campaigns by the Mongol Empire in the 13th century, conquering most of Asia and Eastern Europe.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古帝国分裂后的四大汗国之一，由成吉思汗长子术赤的后代建立，统治东欧和中亚部分地区。
description.en: One of the four major khanates that emerged after the fragmentation of the Mongol Empire. Founded by the descendants of Jochi, the eldest son of Genghis Khan, it ruled over parts of Eastern Europe and Central Asia.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古帝国分裂后的四大汗国之一，由成吉思汗次子察合台的后代建立，统治中亚地区。
description.en: One of the four major khanates that emerged after the fragmentation of the Mongol Empire. Founded by the descendants of Chagatai, the second son of Genghis Khan, it ruled over Central Asia.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古帝国分裂后的四大汗国之一，由成吉思汗三子窝阔台的后代建立，后被元朝和察合台汗国瓜分。
description.en: One of the four major khanates that emerged after the fragmentation of the Mongol Empire. Founded by the descendants of Ögedei, the third son of Genghis Khan, it was later partitioned by the Yuan dynasty and the Chagatai Khanate.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古帝国分裂后的四大汗国之一，由拖雷之子旭烈兀建立，统治波斯及西亚地区。
description.en: One of the four major khanates that emerged after the fragmentation of the Mongol Empire. Founded by Hulagu, a son of Tolui, it ruled over Persia and West Asia.

description.zh-cn: 忽必烈于1271年颁布的诏书，正式建立国号“大元”。
description.en: An edict issued by Kublai Khan in 1271, formally establishing the state name 'Great Yuan'.

description.zh-cn: 南宋最后一位皇帝。在崖山海战中，由丞相陆秀夫背负投海殉国。
description.en: The last emperor of the Southern Song dynasty. During the Battle of Yamen, he committed suicide by drowning with his chancellor Lu Xiufu.

description.zh-cn: 南宋末年丞相。在崖山海战战败后，背负幼主赵昺投海殉国。
description.en: A chancellor in the late Southern Song dynasty. After the defeat at the Battle of Yamen, he committed suicide by drowning, taking the child emperor Zhao Bing with him.

description.zh-cn: 元朝与南宋的最后一场战役，元军获胜，南宋灭亡。
description.en: The final battle between the Yuan dynasty and the Southern Song dynasty, resulting in a Yuan victory and the end of the Southern Song.

description.zh-cn: 1206年，铁木真在鄂嫩河源头召开忽里勒台，即皇帝位，建立大蒙古国，并获得“成吉思汗”的尊号。
description.en: In 1206, at a kurultai on the banks of the Onon River, Temüjin was acknowledged as emperor, establishing the Great Mongol State and receiving the title of 'Genghis Khan'.

description.zh-cn: 也速该是成吉思汗的父亲。
description.en: Yesugei was the father of Genghis Khan.

description.zh-cn: 拖雷是成吉思汗的第四子。
description.en: Tolui was the fourth son of Genghis Khan.

description.zh-cn: 窝阔台是成吉思汗的第三子。
description.en: Ögedei was the third son of Genghis Khan.

description.zh-cn: 蒙哥是拖雷的长子。
description.en: Möngke was the eldest son of Tolui.

description.zh-cn: 忽必烈是拖雷的儿子。
description.en: Kublai was a son of Tolui.

description.zh-cn: 旭烈兀是拖雷的儿子。
description.en: Hulagu was a son of Tolui.

description.zh-cn: 阿里不哥是拖雷的幼子。
description.en: Ariq Böke was the youngest son of Tolui.

description.zh-cn: 成吉思汗建立大蒙古国后，发动了一系列对外扩张战争。
description.en: After establishing the Great Mongol State, Genghis Khan launched a series of external expansionist wars.

description.zh-cn: 经过多次征伐，成吉思汗于1227年最终灭亡西夏。
description.en: After several campaigns, Genghis Khan finally destroyed the Western Xia in 1227.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古帝国自成吉思汗起开始攻打金朝，最终由窝阔台于1234年彻底灭亡金朝。
description.en: The Mongol Empire began its assault on the Jin dynasty under Genghis Khan, and finally completed the conquest under Ögedei Khan in 1234.

description.zh-cn: 1218年，成吉思汗派遣大将哲别征服西辽。
description.en: In 1218, Genghis Khan dispatched his general Jebe to conquer the Qara Khitai.

description.zh-cn: 因讹答剌事件，成吉思汗于1219年亲率大军西征，征服了花剌子模王朝。
description.en: Triggered by the Otrar incident, Genghis Khan personally led a large-scale invasion in 1219 and conquered the Khwarazmian dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 1258年，旭烈兀率领的蒙古军队攻陷巴格达，灭亡了阿拔斯王朝。
description.en: In 1258, Mongol forces led by Hulagu sacked Baghdad and destroyed the Abbasid Caliphate.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古帝国对南宋进行了长达数十年的战争，最终由忽必烈建立的元朝于1279年灭亡南宋。
description.en: The Mongol Empire waged war against the Southern Song dynasty for decades, culminating in its final conquest in 1279 by the Yuan dynasty, founded by Kublai Khan.

description.zh-cn: 蒙哥是蒙古帝国的第四位大汗，也是最后一位统治整个统一帝国的蒙古大汗。
description.en: Möngke was the fourth Great Khan of the Mongol Empire and the last to rule over a united empire.

description.zh-cn: 忽必烈与阿里不哥的汗位之争导致了拖雷家族内战，这场内战标志着统一的蒙古帝国走向分裂。
description.en: The struggle for the throne between Kublai and Ariq Böke led to the Toluid Civil War, which marked the beginning of the fragmentation of the unified Mongol Empire.

description.zh-cn: 忽必烈在内战期间于开平自行即位，并以汉地为基础，最终建立了元朝，使之成为帝国分裂后的主要实体之一。
description.en: During the civil war, Kublai enthroned himself in Kaiping and, using his power base in Chinese territory, eventually established the Yuan dynasty, making it one of the main entities after the empire's fragmentation.

description.zh-cn: 内战后，钦察汗国等汗国取得了事实上的独立地位。
description.en: After the civil war, khanates like the Golden Horde achieved de facto independence.

description.zh-cn: 内战后，察合台汗国等汗国取得了事实上的独立地位。
description.en: After the civil war, khanates like the Chagatai Khanate achieved de facto independence.

description.zh-cn: 内战后，伊儿汗国等汗国取得了事实上的独立地位。
description.en: After the civil war, khanates like the Ilkhanate achieved de facto independence.

description.zh-cn: 在蒙哥汗去世后，忽必烈与阿里不哥为争夺汗位展开了长达四年的内战。
description.en: After the death of Möngke Khan, Kublai and Ariq Böke fought a four-year civil war for the title of Great Khan.

description.zh-cn: 1271年，忽必烈颁布《建国号诏》，正式将国号定为“大元”，建立元朝。
description.en: In 1271, Kublai Khan issued the 'Edict on the Establishment of the State Name', formally establishing the Yuan dynasty with the name 'Great Yuan'.

description.zh-cn: 该诏书的颁布标志着元朝的正式建立。
description.en: The issuance of this edict marked the official establishment of the Yuan dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 元朝被明朝推翻后，其残余势力退回蒙古高原，史称北元。
description.en: After the Yuan dynasty was overthrown by the Ming, its remnants retreated to the Mongolian Plateau, historically known as the Northern Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 1368年，由朱元璋建立的明朝攻陷元大都，结束了元朝在中原的统治。
description.en: In 1368, the Ming dynasty, founded by Zhu Yuanzhang, captured the Yuan capital Dadu, ending Yuan rule over China proper.

description.zh-cn: 朱元璋于1368年建立明朝，并推翻了元朝的统治。
description.en: Zhu Yuanzhang founded the Ming dynasty in 1368 and overthrew the Yuan dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明朝攻陷元大都，元廷北撤，标志着作为统一帝国的蒙古帝国最终瓦解。
description.en: The Ming dynasty's capture of the Yuan capital Dadu and the retreat of the Yuan court to the north marked the final dissolution of the Mongol Empire as a unified entity.

description.zh-cn: 厓山海战是元灭南宋的最后一场战役，南宋在此战后彻底灭亡。
description.en: The Battle of Yamen was the final battle in the Yuan conquest of the Southern Song, leading to the complete fall of the Southern Song dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 在厓山海战战败后，陆秀夫背负幼主赵昺投海殉国。
description.en: After the defeat at the Battle of Yamen, Lu Xiufu committed suicide by drowning, taking the child emperor Zhao Bing with him.

description.zh-cn: 在厓山海战战败后，南宋末代皇帝赵昺由丞相陆秀夫背负投海殉国。
description.en: After the defeat at the Battle of Yamen, Zhao Bing, the last emperor of the Southern Song, died after his chancellor Lu Xiufu jumped into the sea with him.
